comments.body:
Is there a particular reason to create a scheduling PDBLister? I think we can directly use `policyv1beta1.PodDisruptionBudgetLister`.

Maybe a technical debt? Because I see other scheduling specific listers (NodeLister/PodLister/ServiceLister/etc.)

There is no PodDisruptionBudgetLister in api/policy/v1beta1. The lister is in client-go. I am not sure if creating a dependency on client-go is justified when we only need an interface. Unfortunately, there is one such dependency in "generic_scheduler" which I think we should remove.

That's fair.



> Unfortunately, there is one such dependency in "generic_scheduler" which I think we should remove.

Yeap, that's what I observed which is used for PVCLister
